title: Information Detective Project: Learning Information Literacy Through Games and Activities

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental digital device operation skills and elementary-level reading comprehension
context.additional_context: A course for university students exploring information literacy education methods applicable to elementary school settings.

learning_goals: Learners develop and utilize a three-step checklist to evaluate the credibility of diverse information sources.
Learners apply information verification techniques in hypothetical problem scenarios to derive logical conclusions.

Learners will form teams of 2â€“3 peers on a gamification platform (Kahoot!, Minecraft: Education Edition) and complete eight collaborative tasks over four weeks. They will write a critical thinking report achieving 4+ points (5-point scale) according to the provided rubric (problem-solving strategy, creativity, logical reasoning, etc.).
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
